name: Bearware
description:
Bearware is a first-person horror game set in a creepy dark forest where you will need to find your car by using your phone's GPS. Bearware of sound as the bears can hear you running and walking. You will need to listen out for the bears as they will be doing the same. If a bear does hear you, you better hide.

Third-party assets:

Forest animals

Footsteps Sound Pack

Meadow Environment - Dynamic Nature

Old Rusty Car

Front
